name: uswds-sf-lightning-community
description: A Salesforce Lightning Community Theme and related components built upon US Web Design System

scripts.org:create: sf org create scratch -f config/scratch-def.json -a $(date '+%Y%m%d')_$(git branch --show-current) -w 10 -y 30 && sf config set target-org=$(date '+%Y%m%d')_$(git branch --show-current)
scripts.uswds:sync: rsync -Rr node_modules/@uswds/uswds/*.md node_modules/@uswds/uswds/dist/css/*.min.css* node_modules/@uswds/uswds/dist/scss/* node_modules/@uswds/uswds/dist/fonts/*/*.{ttf,woff} node_modules/@uswds/uswds/dist/img/** node_modules/@uswds/uswds/dist/js/*.min.js* force-app/main/default/staticresources/uswds_3_x &&  mv force-app/main/default/staticresources/uswds_3_x/node_modules/@uswds/uswds/*.md force-app/main/default/staticresources/uswds_3_x && mv force-app/main/default/staticresources/uswds_3_x/node_modules/@uswds/uswds/dist force-app/main/default/staticresources/uswds_3_x && rm -rf force-app/main/default/staticresources/uswds_3_x/node_modules
